tool_description:
- OUT OF SERVICE-  SWITCH TO NEW BACKEND

Feed it a ticker and return next payout date or yield  in response.

/payout example: 
https://sundayfinance.p.rapidapi.com/stock/agnc
output:
{"result":["agnc,14.56%"]}

/yield example: 
https://sundayfinance.p.rapidapi.com/yield/aapl
output:
{"result":["aapl,16 Feb 2023 (Thu)"]}
name: sundayfinance
title: sundayfinance

api_list.name: Get the yield
api_list.description: Feed in the ticker and get the yield
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sundayfinance.p.rapidapi.com/yield/agnc"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sundayfinance.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://sundayfinance.p.rapidapi.com/yield/{ticker}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sundayfinance.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get the next dividend payout date
api_list.description: Feed in the ticke and get the next dividend payout date.

url = "https://sundayfinance.p.rapidapi.com/payout/aapl"

        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
